name: pino-devtools
description: A transport for viewing the logs in your favorite browser devtools

scripts.build: rimraf dist/ && babel -d dist/src/ -D --ignore src/client.js src/ && cp src/client.js dist/src/client.js && cp -r ./{index.js,LICENSE.txt,README.md,package.json,docs/} dist/

author: Mozilla Add-ons Team
